document_data.name: Saint Uzurr
document_data.mainbody:
'''Saint Uzurr''' was a saint of [[Ilmater]].<ref group="note">No details have been given about St. Uzurr.

The walled monastery called the [[Cloister of St. Uzurr]] in [[Lapaliiya]] was founded by Ilmatari missionaries from [[Calimshan]] during the time of the [[Shoon Imperium]] ([[27 DR|27]]â€“[[450 DR]]). By [[1370 DR]], the city of [[Uzurr]] had grown up around it and was led by the [[Order of St. Uzurr]].
